Posts.Content: Sorry your wife has "joined the C club". I has a single mastectomy July 21st, so around 5 weeks ago. My sttuation differs but my one suggestion for your wife would be to do the arm exercises in order to keep arm mobility. . . . . .
Posts.Title: My awesome wife has breast cancer.

Posts.Content: greetings ~ It's been a month since my single mastectomy. I decided not to have reconstruction. Most of the swelling is down but my chest looks like crap. I am over weight but both ends have points and look like dog ears....it's lumpy above and below the incision line. I planned tro have a tatoo cover the area but it wwould have to be an ocean scene at this point! Feedback please!!!! Should I just give it time as I exercise and drop weight or look into plastic surgery. My insurance covers reconstruction so it might cover it. I didn't expect a lot, just a smoothe chest area . . . .  it's pretty upsetting.
Posts.Title: after the mastectomy looks lumpy. . . .

Posts.Content: Goodness you have gone through the ringer. . . bad enough dealing with the big c, but to have to put up with the experience you've had is so sad. My heart goes out to you. If he dropped you then he didn't have the right supportive attitude and you are better off getting a new Dr. I never expected the crap I've had to contend with in addition to getting my head around the concept of cancer. Best of luck to you.
Posts.Title: Failed mastectomy, failed reconstructions x 2, failed care!

Posts.Content: I think maybe you can look at this with a different perspective. Pray she be healthy, but since you noted she is a deama queen don't get sucked into her drama. You have no need to know . . . . yes it is dispictable if she lied, but if she did, then what? Tell her if she needs a ride you would help but other than that,  look the other way....
Posts.Title: Is she lying about Breast cancer?

Posts.Content: Comment I'm sorry to hear of your sisters diagnosis.

Posts.Content: Vanisie, your journey is a horrible one.  Many I ask what stage you were diagnosed?
